content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity generator at position(-11.5, 18.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Steam engine at position(-11.5, 18.5)
- Boiler at position(-11.5, 25.0)
- Offshore pump at position(-9.5, 24.5)
- Small electric pole at position(-11.5, 26.5)

### Lab at position(2.5, 1.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Lab at position(2.5, 1.5)

### Copper plate mine at position(x)
Consists of following entities
- Burner mining drill (position x1) and a furnace at position(y1)
- Burner mining drill (position x2) and a furnace at position(y2)
- Burner mining drill (position x3) and a furnace at position(y3)

### Copper cable factory
Consists of following entities
- Burner mining drill (position x1) and a furnace at position(y1)
- Assembling machine at position(z1) and inserter at position(a) that puts into assembling machine
- Beltgroup (position) that connects the furnace at position y1 to assembling machine at position(z1)

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting placing.

### Errors related to power connections
- Ensure that all entities requiring power are properly connected to a power source. Check the connections and make sure there are no gaps in the power network.

### Errors when attempting to find entities
- Verify the coordinates of the entity you are trying to interact with. Ensure that the entity exists at the specified position before attempting to connect or interact with it.
